reviewText: The Wind in the Willows should be on everyone shelf, all ages and all will enjoy for years.  Lessons to learn by too.
I purchased this movie because it is a very wonderful story about friends. I have been watching this movie for many many years as an adult and it truly takes me away to a wonderful state of mind!

I had ordered several Wind in the Willow DVDs. This was not a British production or the Disney production. It was a good representation of the classic. I did give this to some children to introduce them to the story. It is a good DVD, just not up to the others I have seen.

I don't know if our DVD is a dud or what, but for at least 50% of the movie, the dialogue is inaudible because of a poor sound mix.

The music and sound effects are very loud in these spots, but the dialogue is merely detectable. You can see the characters mouths moving, but can't tell what they are saying.
